figure_1.title: FIGURE 1.
figure_1.caption: PRISMA flowchart displaying the process of identification and selection of included articles.

claims.sentence:
57

RESULTS
Search results
As shown in Figure 1, 1315 references were identified, of which 353 were duplicates, leaving 962 articles for title and abstract screening.
After full‐text review, 142 failed to meet the eligibility criteria (see reasons in Figure 1) leaving 80 articles.
